name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zhongli And Xiao Lanterns Rite Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate the Lantern Rite with Zhongli and Xiao! Download now for vibrant live wallpapers and a festive Genshin Impact tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the festive world of Zhongli and Xiao with the Lantern Rite live wallpaper extension! Featuring high-quality animated visuals of these two powerful characters, this extension captures the beauty and magic of the Lantern Rite Festival in Genshin Impact, with dazzling lanterns, serene landscapes, and dynamic animations.

Key Features:
Dynamic Zhongli & Xiao Wallpapers: Enjoy stunning animated backgrounds showcasing Zhongli’s geo mastery and Xiao’s solemn presence during the Lantern Rite celebration.
Clock & Date Display: Keep track of time with a sleek and stylish clock and date interface that enhances the festival atmosphere.
Quick Access Links: Easily navigate to your favorite websites with customizable shortcuts designed for a smooth browsing experience.
Additional Options: Explore more extensions, check privacy policies, or uninstall effortlessly.

Perfect for Genshin Impact fans who love the Lantern Rite Festival, this extension brings the festive spirit of Zhongli and Xiao to your browser.

Download now and let Zhongli and Xiao light up your screen with Lantern Rite magic!
